entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
